channel.title: Elysian 2006 Remake || 10x XP || Stable Eco. || 3 Developers || 10+ Quests
channel.description:
[center][b]Forums - https://elysianrsps.com [/b][/center] [center][b]Download Client - https://elysianrsps.com/2006/client.jar
Webclient - In Progress[/b][/center]
Media
[spoiler][img]http://i.imgur.com/r6UJCnO.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/ZfqxVbU.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/Y8YLKvC.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/xbCRwTi.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/WF0cCqK.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/bKK2QAu.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/LkcoQ6y.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/VApGU1M.png[/img] UPDATED TAB!!!!!!!
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/LuisNhF.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/B9YjaDd.png[/img] [/spoiler]
Current Fixes... (More to add when we go along)
client cachedownloader(FIXED) eatting bug, do emote(FIXED) Capitalize first letter on login box(FIXED)-- works for me idk why MAJOR ERROR IN SERVER LOADING WTF(FIXED OMG) invisible tab beside smiley(FIXED) Newcomer map doesn't work (fixed only shows interface now) firemaking clipping (FIXED) When you log out it says "world 8" instead of "offline"(FIXED) log out private chat doesn't say "Dark has logged out."(FIXED) All stores 100% correct Can't click on "Dark wishes to trade with you" to open trade screen(FIXED) Major bug in firemaking, causes lag(FIXED) Brightness level doesn't save(FIXED) Private chat settings don't save(FIXED) Added all clickingbuttons to current quests Report abuse system(FINISHED) Rewrote a new Dialogue System, You can use the old one if you want. some lumbridge dialogue(Hans and lumbridge sage) doors gets stuck(FIXED) Imp catcher, rune mysteries, restless ghost, cooks assistant, sheep shearer, doric's quest all work! :) When sedridor teles you to rune ess the portal takes you to varrock(SHOULD BE FIXED) Added full drops system Make it reset current skills when doing other skills(FIXED) Music volume doesn't work(FIXED) - red buttons don't save. Effect volume doesn't work(FIXED) - The red buttons don't save. Magic sprites don't outline(FIXED) Added random events so far: Evil chicken, spirit tree, ent, genie When all skills are 99, send total level message(ADDED) make it so that you can't mass click dummies in varrock(FIXED) Maximum 1 player online per ip.(FIXED) Bank Pins(ADDED) make shops restock over time(They do restock)
In Progress?
make it so you can't light fires in banks Correct combat styles(Lunge will do emote lunge) increase timer for ent randoms river troll, drunken dwarf, swarm, strangle plant, Cap'n hand, shade, rock golem, whirlpool, big fish, mysterious old man, exploding rock, axe handle/axe head, evil bob, sandwich lady, mime, frog, freaky forester, drill demon global drop dupe bug(Not as important because u can only pickup one anyways) When you click a members item in the smithing menu it says members only Make swarms unattackable

item.title: Elysian 2006 Remake || 10x XP || Stable Eco. || 3 Developers || 10+ Quests
item.dc:creator: @sorecheeny sorecheeny
item.description:
@sorecheeny wrote:

[quote=“Trisidia, post:15, topic:545226”][quote author=Miss Silabsoft link=topic=664107.msg4439948#msg4439948 date=1406238277]
Hi disabling my account does not actually fix the dupes or the object exploit just so you know
[/quote]
Nice cheat client though, adding UID to clean that off:)[/quote]
:palm:

Read full topic

item.title: Elysian 2006 Remake || 10x XP || Stable Eco. || 3 Developers || 10+ Quests
item.dc:creator: @wimstr wimstr
item.description:
@wimstr wrote:

[quote=“Trisidia, post:13, topic:545226”][quote author=Miss Silabsoft link=topic=664107.msg4439446#msg4439446 date=1406065280]

new players won’t be able to leave the spawn point until you reset the server.
[/quote]
Fixed.

Oh and Wimstr, the one that begged for staff on peoples servers

I suggest you stop with your abusing mate… You love criticizing[/quote]

Funny shit Trisidia.

I never begged for staff on any server, i particate in a project and people respect me.
You’re the one that spammed my pm on your server earlier, begging me to donate rsgp or $ via paypal.
That server was horribly coded, then you moved to a leech server which didn’t go well either.
And now you’re trying a ‘new’ server which is like remake number 300.

Don’t get pissed at me, just because you can’t admit all your servers fail.
And yes i love criticizing you, because you tell other people how they beg and can’t do anything.
While in fact you’re not even better, then me or anyone else these days being within a server.

Anyways goodluck with this server.
Oh yeah ahem i’m not the only one thinking this way.

[quote=“Elrick, post:7, topic:543153”][quote author=lare69 link=topic=662030.msg4426911#msg4426911 date=1401278414]
oh god you’re back

good luck anyway
[/quote]
Thank you for confirming. I was almost sure it was the kid who posted a new server every 2 weeks.[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: Elysian 2006 Remake || 10x XP || Stable Eco. || 3 Developers || 10+ Quests
item.dc:creator: @Trisidia Trisidia
item.description:
@Trisidia wrote:

[center]Forums - https://elysianrsps.com
[/center]
[center][b]Download Client - https://elysianrsps.com/2006/client.jar

Webclient - In Progress[/b][/center]

Media

[spoiler]






UPDATED TAB!!!



[/spoiler]

Current Fixes… (More to add when we go along)

client cachedownloader(FIXED)
eatting bug, do emote(FIXED)
Capitalize first letter on login box(FIXED)-- works for me idk why
MAJOR ERROR IN SERVER LOADING WTF(FIXED OMG)
invisible tab beside smiley(FIXED)
Newcomer map doesn’t work (fixed only shows interface now)
firemaking clipping (FIXED)
When you log out it says “world 8” instead of “offline”(FIXED)
log out private chat doesn’t say “Dark has logged out.”(FIXED)
All stores 100% correct
Can’t click on “Dark wishes to trade with you” to open trade screen(FIXED)
Major bug in firemaking, causes lag(FIXED)
Brightness level doesn’t save(FIXED)
Private chat settings don’t save(FIXED)
Added all clickingbuttons to current quests
Report abuse system(FINISHED)
Rewrote a new Dialogue System, You can use the old one if you want.
some lumbridge dialogue(Hans and lumbridge sage)
doors gets stuck(FIXED)
Imp catcher, rune mysteries, restless ghost, cooks assistant, sheep shearer, doric’s quest all work!
When sedridor teles you to rune ess the portal takes you to varrock(SHOULD BE FIXED)
Added full drops system
Make it reset current skills when doing other skills(FIXED)
Music volume doesn’t work(FIXED) - red buttons don’t save.
Effect volume doesn’t work(FIXED) - The red buttons don’t save.
Magic sprites don’t outline(FIXED)
Added random events so far: Evil chicken, spirit tree, ent, genie
When all skills are 99, send total level message(ADDED)
make it so that you can’t mass click dummies in varrock(FIXED)
Maximum 1 player online per ip.(FIXED)
Bank Pins(ADDED)
make shops restock over time(They do restock)

In Progress?

make it so you can’t light fires in banks
Correct combat styles(Lunge will do emote lunge)
increase timer for ent randoms
river troll, drunken dwarf, swarm, strangle plant, Cap’n hand, shade, rock golem, whirlpool, big fish, mysterious old man, exploding rock, axe handle/axe head, evil bob, sandwich lady, mime, frog, freaky forester, drill demon
global drop dupe bug(Not as important because u can only pickup one anyways)
When you click a members item in the smithing menu it says members only
Make swarms unattackable

Read full topic
item.source: Elysian 2006 Remake || 10x XP || Stable Eco. || 3 Developers || 10+ Quests
